statements: SELECT * FROM budget_variances WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category, actual_amount FROM budget_variances WHERE actual_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category, budgeted_amount FROM budget_variances WHERE budgeted_amount < 500;
SELECT category, actual_amount, budgeted_amount FROM budget_variances WHERE category = 'Utilities';
SELECT * FROM budget_variances ORDER BY actual_amount DESC;
SELECT category, actual_amount, budgeted_amount FROM budget_variances WHERE actual_amount > budgeted_amount ORDER BY category DESC, actual_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM budget_variances WHERE budgeted_amount > 5000
SELECT id, category, actual_amount FROM budget_variances WHERE category LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY actual_amount DESC
SELECT category, SUM(actual_amount), SUM(budgeted_amount) FROM budget_variances GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(actual_amount) > 10000
SELECT category, AVG(actual_amount) AS avg_actual_amount FROM budget_variances GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_actual_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM BudgetActuals
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals ORDER BY budget_id DESC
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals WHERE actual_amount > 1000
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals LIMIT 3
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BudgetActuals JOIN Budgets ON BudgetActuals.budget_id = Budgets.budget_id;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM Budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(budget_amount) AS max_budget_amount FROM Budgets;
SELECT budget_id, SUM(actual_amount) AS total_actual_amount FROM BudgetActuals GROUP BY budget_id HAVING total_actual_amount > 5000;
SELECT category, actual_amount FROM budget_actuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, category, actual_amount, actual_date FROM budget_actuals WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT * FROM budget_variances WHERE variance > 100;
SELECT category, budgeted_amount FROM budget_categories WHERE budgeted_amount < 500;
SELECT id, category_name FROM budget_categories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_actuals WHERE actual_amount > 1000
SELECT category, SUM(actual_amount) AS total_actual_amount FROM budget_actuals GROUP BY category
SELECT category, budget_amount, actual_amount, variance FROM budget_variances WHERE variance < 0 ORDER BY variance DESC
SELECT * FROM budget_categories WHERE budgeted_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT category_name, budgeted_amount, actual_amount, variance FROM budget_categories LEFT JOIN budget_variances ON budget_categories.category_name = budget_variances.category
SELECT * FROM BudgetActualAmounts
SELECT budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetActualAmounts WHERE variance > 0
SELECT id, actual_amount, variance FROM BudgetActualAmounts ORDER BY actual_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM BudgetItems WHERE category = 'Food'
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM BudgetItems WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM BudgetActualAmounts;
SELECT id, budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetActualAmounts WHERE variance > 100;
SELECT visualization_name, type, data FROM BudgetVisualizations ORDER BY visualization_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, description FROM BudgetItems WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetCategories WHERE budget_amount > actual_amount ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM BudgetActuals
SELECT expense_type, budget_amount FROM BudgetExpenses ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_id = 3
SELECT metric_name, actual_amount FROM BudgetMetrics WHERE budget_amount > 1000
SELECT variance_amount FROM BudgetVariances WHERE metric_id = 5
SELECT * FROM BudgetActuals
SELECT budget_id, actual_amount FROM BudgetExpenses WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 't%'
SELECT metric_name, budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetMetrics WHERE actual_amount > budget_amount
SELECT variance_id, metric_id, variance_amount FROM BudgetVariances WHERE variance_amount < 0
